item.title: Revealed: The new Covid-19 data that shows how NZ got it right
item.description: New modelling has indicated that New Zealand got it right by locking down – and that other countries battling Covid-19 can learn from our example. It's also suggested that our rate of virus reproduction ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202017/virusjamie_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=A health worker suits up at Auckland's Airport Oaks testing station. New data shows New Zealand's Covid-19 efforts have been effective. Photo / Sylvie Whinray

item.title: Epsom brothel homicide: Police charge man with murder
item.description:
Police have charged a man with murder over the death of a 30-year-old man at an Auckland brothel.

item.description:
